channel.title: Project on Azure
channel.description: Recent content in Project on Azure

item.title: CS440 Rendering Engine
item.description:
基于PBRT的离线渲染引擎，基本框架是Nori.

What we have done in this course and project is to extend this basic renderer to support more full-fledged physically-based lighting/integrating/bsdf functions…

The technical details in this passage may not be perfect.

item.title: Neural ODE
item.description: Dynamic system & Machine learning When I was reading the paper Neural Ordinary Differential Equations, I was confused of the adjoint method, so I turned to A Proposal on Machine Learning via Dynamical Systems. It is clearer about what we should do. We begin from the side of dynamical system: Consider the differential equation in $\frac{dx}{dt} = f(u(t),x), x(0)=x_0, u(t)\in U, t\in [0,T]$ We want to find the function $u(t)$, defined in $[0,T]$ that minimizes/maximizes
